ygData.subject: For Tallon Zek Players:Guild Formation
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi guys, For those who would be playing on Tallon Zek.A Singaporean Evil Guild would be formed,thus only the Darkelves would be accepted[Although a few orges
ygData.messageBody:
Hi guys,
For those who would be playing on Tallon Zek.A Singaporean Evil Guild would be formed,thus only the Darkelves would be accepted[Although a few orges and trolls would be allowed].Im still trying to find more SG members before we might open to the other TZ players.Heres some info on the guild and I will post the charter soon.
Interested SG TZ players,plz mail me ASAP if u wish to be a part of the Greatest House the other races have EVER known.

/ooc hehe...nice intro anot ? :)but hor if u all not comming,no choice but recuit angmoh lor..hehehe[got any around,no offence .. :)]..ok read below for the basic stats on guild.

GuildName: House Vanguard
Charter:havent thought abt it yet but it will be something like this:
A House specially trained to hold various assaults on the Human City,Freeport to clear out our neighbouring "low" races and to tell every single living thing on Norrath that DarkElves are the SUPREME Race.Orges and Trolls would be our cannon fodder in this trips while WE..the DarkElves would dish the real damage.
House Vanguard would also hold Neriak Defences against enemy races.

Current Members:Dantrag,DarkElven SK
Sunblade oei what class u using? :)

The guild would be split into 3 sections primarily:
Melee Magthere:All melee and hybrid classes would be under this group and would have an officer.
Arcane Academy:the Spellcasters school and a officer
Innoruuk's Temple:The Clerics and a officer

ok until TZ's launch,I would be recruiting ppl and doing up the page,stay tuned :)

Dantrag
DarkElven Shadowknight
Tallon Zek
